name: Prorotype Scrapyard
description:
Prototype Scrapyard is a non-serious puzzle mini-game about game development made for LD37 http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

Main goal: collect exisitng ideas and prototypes and build path to release
If you have perfomance problems, please try medium and/or low visual settings from Pause menu(Esc or P)

And thank you for your time. If you have any questions, suggestions or just want to say hi, please don't be shy, write some comments.

Music by Ross Bugden

Thanks to Deomon, Vurfen, Trigor and Breakmind for beta-testing
Special thanks for A. Protasenya for inspiration

Change log:
v7(LD release): better spawn logic

v8: a lot of bugfixes

Known issues(haven't had enough time to fix):
- sometimes collected block is not spawning on RMB
